Interface BusinessRuleSet

All Superinterfaces:
ModelComponent, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessRuleSetEx
public interface BusinessRuleSet
extends ModelComponent

Rule set represents a collection of rules.

Validate a candidate rule name Ensure that the name does not contain any invalid characters, check if the name is a duplicate, etc

Parameters:

Returns:

generateNewRuleName

java.lang.String generateNewRuleName(java.lang.String seedName,
                                     boolean copy)
Based on a seed name, generate a new rule name that doesn't collide with any already present in a given rule set.

Parameters:
seedName - - the desired name of the rule, while will be modified to ensure uniqueness
copy - - true if you are duplicating a rule, thus name will be seedNameCopyN, otherwise will be seedNameN
Returns:
a unique rule name based on the seed

discardChanges

Discard changes made to rule

Parameters:
rule - rule to rollback

resolveConflict

Resolving conflict by copying the given modified rule, since there is another copy of the rule saved in dictionary already.

Parameters:
rule - the local modified rule.
Returns:
the copied rule.
